issue.title: [C++] SIMD on ARM NEON
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5382](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5382). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow doesn't yet support SIMD on arm architectures. SSE on ARM can be complicated, but there are a couple of libraries We could depend on, namely:
- https://github.com/nemequ/simde (MIT)
- https://github.com/catboost/catboost/tree/ee47f9aa399833cb04bfeec5fe9f3e3792d428e4/library/sse (Apache)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5382?focusedCommentId=16861461) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
There's also https://github.com/VcDevel/Vc

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5382?focusedCommentId=16931657) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Pushing this back as we already have almost no x86 SSE optimizations.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5382?focusedCommentId=17191779) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
There's no reason to keep an issue open for this "just in case".
